verses.name: Psalms 109:1
verses.text: Psalmus David.   Dixit Dominus Domino meo :  Sede a dextris meis,  donec ponam inimicos tuos scabellum pedum tuorum.

verses.name: Psalms 109:2
verses.text: Virgam virtutis tuæ emittet Dominus ex Sion :  dominare in medio inimicorum tuorum.

verses.name: Psalms 109:3
verses.text: Tecum principium in die virtutis tuæ  in splendoribus sanctorum :  ex utero, ante luciferum, genui te.

verses.name: Psalms 109:4
verses.text: Juravit Dominus, et non pœnitebit eum :  Tu es sacerdos in æternum  secundum ordinem Melchisedech.

verses.name: Psalms 109:5
verses.text: Dominus a dextris tuis ;  confregit in die iræ suæ reges.

verses.name: Psalms 109:6
verses.text: Judicabit in nationibus, implebit ruinas ;  conquassabit capita in terra multorum.

verses.name: Psalms 109:7
verses.text: De torrente in via bibet ;  propterea exaltabit caput.
